function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes adjusted for COVID-19 cases.","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of cause-and-effect relationships between green features and psychological health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Control for other confounding variables to accurately assess the impact of green features on psychological health outcomes.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis of data, multivariate regression analysis.","People":"Researchers, public health professionals, policymakers.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Effects of lockdown on individuals' perception and behavioral adjustment.","Impact":"Limitations and behavioral adjustments affecting the psychological well-being of the population, regardless of regional epidemiological specificities.","Mitigation":"Implementation of support measures for mental health, provision of resources for coping and adaptation during the lockdown.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, virtual mental health support, online counseling services.","People":"General population, mental health professionals, government agencies.","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations."},{"Description":"Differential effects of indoor and outdoor green features on psychological health outcomes.","Impact":"Potential misalignment of intervention strategies in addressing specific psychological health outcomes related to green features.","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research to understand the differential effects and develop tailored intervention strategies.","Technologies":"Data analytics, qualitative research methods, intervention design.","People":"Researchers, mental health professionals, urban planners.","Owner":"Research institutions, mental health organizations, urban planning agencies."},{"Description":"Interaction of current working mode and green view affecting psychological health outcomes.","Impact":"Potential impact on workers' health and well-being during the COVID-19 containment period.","Mitigation":"Implementation of remote work policies and support for creating conducive remote work environments.","Technologies":"Telecommuting tools, virtual collaboration platforms, ergonomic assessments.","People":"Employers, employees, occupational health professionals.","Owner":"Employers, occupational health organizations."}]}
